feature.label: Pellet OWL reasoner
feature.description: Pellet is an open-source Java based OWL DL reasoner. It can be used in conjunction with either Jena or OWL-API libraries. Pellet provides functionalities to validate ontology species, check consistency of ontologies, classify the taxonomy, check entailments and answer a subset of RDQL queries (known as ABox queries in DL terminology).
